comments: Dendrobium henshallii Reichb. f. named after this author.
examples: Epidendrum quesnelianum Henshall, Practical treatise on cult. orchidac. pl.: 113 (1845), as guesnelianum, in syn. under E. decromum. Given as basionym of Encyclia quesneliana (Henshall) C.L. Withner (2000).
source: R. Desmond, Dict. Brit. & Irish Bot. & Hortic.: 302 (1994).
